participant_1.background:
I wake up, check my schedule for the day, and go about my business.
I am looking for a new challenge, as I have already accomplished everything I wanted to with my family business.
i was born male and transitioned to female when i was 17.
My daily routine consists of working on my knitting projects and learning new techniques.
i like to surf every chance i get.

participant_2.background:
I like to cuddle up with my dog Wonwon on a rainy day.
I'm going to keep working hard and hope to do my best in the marathon.
I want to spend some allergy-free quality time with my grandkids.
My first purchase was a house for my sons and I to live in.
I had to give up my job to take care of my health.

content.text: Hey there, I hope you are having a great day!
Hi there, it's going good, thanks! How are you doing?
I'm doing well thanks! I'm just hanging out with my dog Wonwon, cuddling up on a rainy day.
That sounds lovely, I love rainy days. I like to cuddle up with my dog too, his name is Buddy.
What kind of dog is Buddy?
He's a Beagle! He's the sweetest dog in the world.
Beagles are so cute! They look like little teddy bears.
Do you have any other hobbies besides cuddling with your dog?
I'm training for a marathon right now, so I'm running a lot. I also love to cook and bake.
That's awesome! I'm not very athletic, but I love to cook too.
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes. I'm not very good at baking, but I love to try new recipes.
Pasta is always good! I love making lasagna.
Lasagna is one of my favorites too! We should have a pasta cook-off sometime!
That would be fun! I'd love to have a cooking competition.
Great! I'll start practicing right away!
